Subject: Self-Publishing 101
Description: Explore the pros and  cons of self-publishing in the digital age.  Is there still a stigma associated with being self-published? The panel will discuss the many different sites that offer self-publishing, e-books, marketing your books, and being in control of your book.  Speakers include:Tracy Herrell, Michael W.
